About

I am Web Developer with hard 3d CAD Skills from Kislovodsk, Russia. Looking for job in EU/USA to have fun international time and experience in Web-lifeway.

Big story of my training (the small one is on front page):

Web development! :

This is red

Last time training:

  • made React + Redux Certificate on freeCodeCamp.

  • Have a first-touch Haskell with ‘Learn Haskell with FSD’ (https://rizzoma.com/topic/c27faf1cfa188c1120f59af4c35e6099/0_b_9n8n_8jl2l/).

  • Got some badly tries with Cordova app web development trying to make mapbox Cordova plugin, that was too much stuff that goes around Workers and mapbox API connection. Linux Cordova development was strict by JDK + Android versions that doesn’t sit well with Cordova stack versions.

2019-2020 :

  • working on WordPress theme; making for delivery company in London; Redux
  • , PHP , Javascript , jQuery practice, Mapbox API, Google API, Stripe, WooCommerce (private repository, was on domain www.instantpickup.delivery).

2020:

  • Training: WordPress login plugin (https://github.com/Vimpil/login_plugin_wp), template plugin (https://github.com/Vimpil/wp_plugin_example1).

  • First tries in PHP MVC framework programming from zero (https://github.com/Vimpil/MVClearPhp) have some feedback on it, need to work on some mistakes there, but still that works good for me now.

2019:

  • Custom WordPress theme creation: https://github.com/Vimpil/html_vosim_wp_theme;

  • Git Pages experiments : https://github.com/Vimpil/vimpil.github.io - Jekyll , Hugo , now this blog is located here.

  • Made fixes on my old site landing project with multiple plugins (https://github.com/Vimpil/Porosya_04_excersise).

  • First time used WooCommerce with WordPress , shop functions added to new theme template https://github.com/Vimpil/Porosya_08_template_wp_twenty-sixteen-child;

2018:

  • custom Jekyll template made (https://github.com/Vimpil/Porosya_08_template)

  • custom Jekyll + usual landing template made (https://github.com/Vimpil/Vladimir_07_template)

2017:

  • site template creation https://github.com/Vimpil/Porosya_06_excersise

  • site template creation https://github.com/Vimpil/Porosya_04_excersise-fixed

2016:

  • site template creation https://github.com/Vimpil/Porosya_03_excersise

  • site template creation https://github.com/Vimpil/Porosya_02_excersise

2017:

3d Modeling/Design :

  • Working with woods CNC Mill models, studying Chine modeling method for cheap jewelry cost and - 3d printing modeling methods for printing object sticks helpers.

Programming:

  • 6 months working as content manager in WebElement company. My last project where I did test cases is http://www.atd-diesel.ru/

  • Working with YII2 webelement framework with it’s own CMS.

  • Basic fronted study: HTML , CSS , JS , JQuery small one PHP code editing;

2012-2016:

3d Modeling/Design :

  • Matrix Gemvision modeling studying and practicing, magic STL healing tool, Zbrush sculpting, Blender 3d modeling, Keyshot and HDRI Light Studio scene render and light setting. Different jewelry stuff, watches, chess, even bullets from the clients body that goes in amulet was in my works.

  • Had some freelance experience with different printer model options to print.

  • Also some time has internship on CNC Mill with 3d RhinoCAM program, did the pathways for mill to create my own models from wax.

  • Was working with jewelers, clients, did design decisions and drafts. Worked with Photoshop for render retouch and models drafts.

  • Got some from-photo scanning experience to use small stuff in models.

  • Has training with furniture modeling, low poly game modeling, exterior modeling and interior modeling. Was worked in Lumion 3d , Modo, 3d Max , Maya , Topogun, Daz3D, Poser, some 3d scan software trying to find modeling features and instruments that I can use combining this programs. And yes, I found some of them so I used it time to time to make work faster.

  • Was experimenting with Unity 3d addons and importing in this program models and animation from Blender and 3d max . Has created my city center in Unity 3d based on already existed 3d max exterior scene, was added there some animation, sounds; optimized models and textures to make it work properly. It was my first experience of 3d scene optimization for game engine.

  • Parallel job was some 2d Mactomedia Flash and Javascript based maps for the sanatorium, designs was already done and i was need to make the technical animation part over there.

  • Has game development training with animation rigging and voice mouth sounding. Materials making and playing around with shader system of multiple render engines.

  • Was participated in team project with custom design and story telling where i was a modeller. Project wasn’t finished, but that was great experience with Unity 3d studing and Vray /Renderman /Cycles render tries, working with light and texturing, retopology and imagination itself. Still want to finish it, but for now the career path is more preferable for me.

  • Got both Construct 2 and Game Maker first time experience, did some simple stuff there.

  • Was experience with Adobe Premier / After Effects for editing some animation video of exterior that I used.

Yoga :

  • From 2011 got two years of Open Yoga University (https://openyogaland.com/) in Moscow. Hardly studying yoga online through theory and practice. Basic Sanskrit learning, reading shastra’s texts. Making video recording and editing work. Making translation work for small amount of texts.

2011:

3d Modeling/Design :

Made some matte painting work based on models that I created from existed photos, added some animation there through flash engine. Studying 3d max .

2008-2010:

Ural Government University named after Gorky:

(top 10 Russian Educational universities)

Studying anthropology. Learning philosophy. Training in debates. Sharping logic and logical thoughts constructions. Learning about mind itself and peoples psychology.

2006-2008:

Specialized educational and scientific center (SUNC) under Ural State University

(top 10 Russian Educational colleges)

Deep studying of humanity arts ; Main subjects are world literature , history , Russian language.

2000-2006:

Yekaterinburg School #170 with deep art study.

3d/2d Graphics :

  • First time reading about shaders. Studying 3d Max , Maya through documentation. Playing around with Bryce 3d.

Programming:

Was training the Macromedia Flash with Action-script first steps. C++ Delphi courses. Pascale practice. Dark Basic. Basic programming language.

Magazine publishing :

My grandfather was an editor of Magazine, so I were one of his co-workers and know how to make a political product that goes directly on the top of society.

1998-2000

Kislovodsk School #20

Deep logic study and soviet materialism. Was using new https://www.petersons.com Western study programs.

Ballet dance Government school .

Musical Government school .

Programming

First tries with Subor (Dendy) by Basic programming.

?RhinoCam ?DeskProto;
